SALESFORCE HELP

REBATE MANAGEMENT
Create Rebate Types for a Program

Define a type of incentive for members with a rebate type. A rebate program can have multiple rebate types. Review some common rebate types. Understand how to aggregate transactions, define calculation criteria, and set benefit thresholds. Create rebate types from the Related tab of a rebate program record.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.
Common Rebate Types
A rebate program can offer multiple incentives to members. Reward members for the volume of sales recorded, for attaining a revenue threshold, or for growing substantially annually.
How Do the Fields Work Together in a Rebate Type?
Review the fields in a Program Rebate Type record and understand how they work together to create an incentive structure. You can create a rebate type from the Related tab of a Rebate Program record.
Create Program Rebate Types by Using APIs
You can create program rebate types for migration and integration purposes by using APIs that are available with Rebate Management. However, to define the eligibility criteria for rebate types that are created by using APIs, ensure that you complete these additional steps.
